name: Exorcist Team
description:
Team up with a friend to become a dynamic demon-busting duo. Work together as the exorcist who knows no spells and the researcher with no spell-casting abilities. With one player on the codex, and one exorcising the demons, can you teamwork your way to a room full of saved souls, or will the forces of evil crush you before you get the chance?

HOW TO PLAY

  • For two players on separate machines/devices.
  • One player takes the role of the exorcist, and another the researcher.
  • The researcher must look up each demon in the codex as the exorcist is presented with it - then let the exorcist know the correct incantation to exorcise it.
  • It's the exorcist's job to let the researcher know what kind of demon is in front of them, and type each correct incantation before the time runs out.
